summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2224, for the improvement of the alleys in block 7, Thompson's University Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same under Ordinance No. 22520 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
